quest.Name: The Iced Man
quest.Accomplishment: You helped a man who was freezing over.

step.Name: Return To Warden Gunnar Vargmunr
step.text: Return to Warden Gunnar Vargmunr with the injectors.

step.Name: Kill 10 Snapjaw Warlords
step.text: Search Qud for Snapjaw Wardlords and kill them.

quest.Name: A Worthy Foe
quest.Accomplishment: With your help, Argyve detected a strange signal.

step.Name: Beat Warden Gunnar Vargmunr in a duel
step.text: Defeat the warden in single combat.

step.Name: Speak to Warden Gunnar Vargmunr
step.text: Speak with Warden Gunnar Vargmunr about the duel.
